001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude.Include;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty.Access;
008import jakarta.persistence.Column;
009import jakarta.persistence.Entity;
010import jakarta.persistence.FetchType;
011import jakarta.persistence.GeneratedValue;
012import jakarta.persistence.Id;
013import jakarta.persistence.Index;
014import jakarta.persistence.JoinColumn;
015import jakarta.persistence.ManyToOne;
016import jakarta.persistence.PrePersist;
017import jakarta.persistence.Table;
018import jakarta.persistence.Temporal;
019import jakarta.persistence.TemporalType;
020import jakarta.validation.constraints.NotBlank;
021import jakarta.validation.constraints.NotEmpty;
022import jakarta.validation.constraints.NotNull;
023import java.time.Instant;
024import java.util.UUID;
025import org.hibernate.annotations.CreationTimestamp;
026import org.hibernate.validator.constraints.Length;
027
028@Entity
029@Table(indexes = {
030    @Index(columnList = "channel_id, posted")
031})
032@JsonInclude(Include.NON_NULL)
033public class Message {
034
035  @Id
036  @GeneratedValue
037  @Column(name = "message_id", nullable = false, updatable = false)
038  @JsonIgnore
039  private long id;
040
041  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = false, unique = true)
042  @JsonProperty(value = "key", access = Access.READ_ONLY)
043  private UUID externalKey;
044
045  @CreationTimestamp
046  @Temporal(TemporalType.TIMESTAMP)
047  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = false)
048  @JsonProperty(access = Access.READ_ONLY)
049  private Instant posted;
050
051  @Column(nullable = false, updatable = false, length = 255)
052  @NotNull
053  @Length(min = 1, max = 255)
054  private String text;
055
056  @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.EAGER, optional = false)
057  @JoinColumn(name = "sender_id", nullable = false, updatable = false)
058  @JsonProperty(access = Access.READ_ONLY)
059  private User sender;
060
061  @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.LAZY, optional = false)
062  @JoinColumn(name = "channel_id", nullable = false, updatable = false)
063  @JsonIgnore
064  private Channel channel;
065
066  public long getId() {
067    return id;
068  }
069
070  public UUID getExternalKey() {
071    return externalKey;
072  }
073
074  public Instant getPosted() {
075    return posted;
076  }
077
078  public String getText() {
079    return text;
080  }
081
082  public void setText(String text) {
083    this.text = text;
084  }
085
086  public User getSender() {
087    return sender;
088  }
089
090  public void setSender(User sender) {
091    this.sender = sender;
092  }
093
094  public Channel getChannel() {
095    return channel;
096  }
097
098  public void setChannel(Channel channel) {
099    this.channel = channel;
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  public int hashCode() {
104    return Long.hashCode(id);
105  }
106
107  @Override
108  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
109    boolean result;
110    if (obj == this) {
111      result = true;
112    } else if (obj instanceof Message other) {
113      result = (id != 0 && id == other.id);
114    } else {
115      result = false;
116    }
117    return result;
118  }
119
120  @PrePersist
121  void generateFieldValues() {
122    externalKey = UUID.randomUUID();
123  }
124  
125}
